chapter.title: Summary
chapter.para: On the whole, this reference supplies you with all necessary information on the functionality that JBoss ESB plugin provides for work with JBoss ESB.
We hope, this guide helped you to get started with the JBoss ESB Tools. For additional information you are welcome on JBoss forum.
